text: Bruce Fraser may refer to: * Bruce Fraser, 1st Baron Fraser of North Cape (1888–1981), British admiral during World War II, Admiral of the Fleet * Sir Bruce Fraser (civil servant) (1910–1993), British civil servant and humorist * Bruce Fraser (author) (1954–2006), author that specialized in digital color technology * Bruce Fraser (basketball) (born 1964), American basketball coach * Bruce Fraser (athlete) (born 1946), English athlete
title: Bruce Fraser
